thumb.title: [TAS] GBC Super Mario Bros. Deluxe "warps" by KingKappa & Shot313 in 04:57.38
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1SwRNS9-XII以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6612M TAS originally published on 2025-06-23Super Mario Bros. Deluxe is a remake of the original Super Mario Bros. with some new game modes, including a challenge mode where coins and time remaining are crucial to gaining the target score and a race mode where Mario competes against Boo to reach each level's finish flag pole first. While this mode looks like a direct port of the NES game, there are different physics and glitches, making optimizing Deluxe a very different task. KingKappa (https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/KingKappa) and Shot313 (https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/Shot313) collaborate on this run to improve the previous run ( https://tasvideos.org/6277M ) by 0.07 seconds thanks to better optimisation.
thumb.last_res_body: 画面が近いなぁ さっきはマリオの... めっちゃうなずいてる 違法すれすれの公... 一見、再現されて... 安全な車を開発す...
